name: Color Up
description:
Protect your ball with your shield while it's going up! Beware of the obstacles.

Move your shield with one finger to protect your ball as it flaps its way up. Clear your way .

Shield controls are easy but it's very hard to reach high distance!

Challenge your friends for the highest score and distance!

Game Features:
- Free to play
- 50+ different Levels
- Power Ups
- More than 25 skins
- 30 Challenges to track your progress
- 6 different colorful themes
- One finger control
- Has sound
- Different obstacles and experience every time
- Endless gameplay
- Lightweight in terms of space and performance. So you can enjoy for hours without worrying about battery.

Stay tuned for regular content updates.
